author: bencomic

left.text: hey my boss is named John Jr. he's not MR. DILLARD but his dad is. and his dad is fucking nuts. its awesome. once a week he shows up, and hes this old fat man whos always scowling.

right.text: maybe. that'd be fucked up dude. he might fire me :(

left.text: maybe john_jr's last name is dillard

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 36
